price: (18) The heaven will break apart therefrom;[1784] ever is His promise fulfilled.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
footnotes: [1784]- From the terror of that Day.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
